name: Send_Fax
description:
**Letter File Options**

**Use existing URL**

With this option, you can use an existing URL to a PDF document. For example, you might generate the pdf on your server.

**Upload File to Our Server**

With this option, you can use the `/uploads` endpoint to upload the document. The `/uploads` endpoint returns a URL that can be used in the `/fax/send` endpoint.

custom_string.description: Your reference. Will be passed back with all replies and delivery reports.

file_url.description: Your URL to your PDF file.

from.description: Your sender id. Must be a valid fax number.

from_email.description: An email address where the reply should be emailed to.

list_id.description: Your list ID if sending to a whole list. Can be used instead of 'to'.

schedule.description: Leave blank for immediate delivery. Your schedule time as a [unix timestamp](http://help.clicksend.com/what-is-a-unix-timestamp).

to.description: Recipient number in E.164 format or local format ([more info](https://help.clicksend.com/SMS/what-format-does-the-recipient-phone-number-need-to-be-in)).
